title: [bug] migrate bug when update NPM dependency "tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager-api"

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

When I attempted to update my project using the migration tool, it failed. Upon reviewing the logs, I discovered that the name of an npm dependency was incorrect. This is the complete output:
â¯ npm run tauri migrate

> RockeIM@0.0.1 tauri
> tauri migrate

    Info Installing NPM dependency "@tauri-apps/api@^2.0.0"...
    Info Installing Cargo dependency "tauri-plugin-process"...
    Info Installing NPM dependency "@tauri-apps/plugin-process@>=2"...
    Added permission `process:default` to `migrated` at /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/capabilities/migrated.json
    Info Adding plugin to /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/src/main.rs
    Info Running `cargo fmt`...
    Info Installing Cargo dependency "tauri-plugin-shell"...
    Info Installing NPM dependency "@tauri-apps/plugin-shell@>=2"...
    Added permission `shell:default` to `migrated` at /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/capabilities/migrated.json
    Info Adding plugin to /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/src/main.rs
    Info Running `cargo fmt`...
    Info Installing Cargo dependency "tauri-plugin-notification"...
    Info Installing NPM dependency "@tauri-apps/plugin-notification@>=2"...
    Added permission `notification:default` to `migrated` at /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/capabilities/migrated.json
    Info Adding plugin to /Users/alarak/WorkSpace/imdesk/src-tauri/src/main.rs
    Info Running `cargo fmt`...
    Info Installing Cargo dependency "tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager"...
    Info Installing NPM dependency "tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager-api"...
failed to migrate from v1: Could not migrate plugin 'clipboard-manager': Failed to install NPM dependency
    Error failed to migrate from v1: Could not migrate plugin 'clipboard-manager': Failed to install NPM dependency

### Reproduction

_No response_

### Expected behavior

_No response_
